name: Monster Truck 4x4 Destruction
description:
This monster truck gravity contains 4 different modes containing Survival Mode, Free Mode, Cash Mode and Campaign Mode. This Xtreme racing free game's mud environment is more like offroad.

Features of Monster Truck Simulator Game 2020 are:
• Amazing Monster Derby Mad Trucks and Army Monster Trucks.
• Driving on Xtreme Impossible Stunts Tracks.
• Realistic Environment.
• Realistic Physics of Mud Trucks.
• Easy controls, best physics of Real Demolition Derby Destruction Truck games in Monster Truck Crash Game.
• Numerous stunt ramps, stunt hight obstacles, impossible hurdles and real enemy trucks.
• Real Collision, bang & destruction and pleasing sound effects in Offroad Mud Truck Driving games.
• Crash, Smash & destroy all enemy rivals in Extreme GT Monster Derby Battle Arena.
• 35+ New vehicles
• 4+ Tracks and Demolition arenas.
• Daily rewards
• A lot of challenging and Difficult levels.

"Offroad Games 2020"
